pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interface to Yandex Translate API // 'Yandex Translate' (https://translate.yandex.com/) is a statistical machine translation system. The system translates separate words, complete texts, and webpages. This package can be used to detect language from text and to translate it to supported target language. For more info: https://tech.yandex.com/translate/doc/dg/concepts/About- docpage/ .
